original_title: 春猿火 x 幸祜 TWO-MAN LIVE 「Singularity Live vol.2」
overview: KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO hosts "Singularity Live vol.2," a two-man live project.  Performers will be two virtual singers, Harusaruhi(春猿火) and Koko(幸祜). The opening act will be CIEL, the same as vol.1.
title: Harusaruhi  x Koko TWO-MAN LIVE 「Singularity Live vol.2」
